## [1.0.0] - 2025-12-13

* **Configure Git globally**

* Set up Git once with consistent global defaults
* Choose how merges and pulls behave
* Define your name, email, and optional website

**Commit and tag signing**

* Enable or disable GPG signing for commits
* Select an existing GPG key
* Automatically sign Git tags by default

**Interactive or scripted usage**

* Guided interactive setup for first-time configuration
* Full command-line control for automation and scripts
* Ideal for new machines and fresh Git environments

**Reliable and repeatable**

* Ensures consistent Git configuration across systems
* Reduces setup errors and manual configuration steps
